Westfield State University is very welcoming. The university is clean, involved, and organized. Anyone could enjoy this place.

textAfterTable: The classes are challenging and interesting. I do not feel over-whelmed at all. The classes in my major (Criminal Justice) are the most interesting. They are so fun to attend that it makes learing easy! Login to rate or flag the reviews Blessing from Springfield, MA 12/20/2010 Reviewer is A current student here. 6 out of 6 people found this review useful. 2 of 47 Categories Comments Great for these types of students If you like a small school and smaller class sizes you are in the right place. WSU also has plenty of chances for you to be a leader. Tips for prospective students Make use of all the opportunities available. And please don't be shy. You can make some great friends here. Bang for the buck The education, the campus, and the town of Westfield and everything it has to offer is well worth going to. There's also alot of support provided by tutors, academic advisers, and
